item.description: The U.S. Navy base at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, stood empty Thursday after the Trump administration transferred the last 18 migrants awaiting deportation,...

item.title: China Cites Old UN Resolution to Justify Taiwan Claim
item.description: China is leaning on a half-century-old U.N. ruling to strengthen its sweeping claim over Taiwan, issuing a white paper this week that Taiwan denounced...

item.title: Ian Kingsbury to Newsmax: Medical Schools Defying Trump's DEI Ban

item.title: Mamdani Struggles to Get Majority Support in NYC Mayoral Race
item.description: Zohran Mamdani could become the first New York City mayor in recent history to be elected without getting majority support.

item.title: Trump in Talks With CBS to Appear on '60 Minutes'
item.description: The White House is in talks with CBS about President Donald Trump appearing on "60 Minutes" for an unedited interview, Semafor reported Thursday.
